description:
Enormous House-Sized Apartment with the Lot...Total Area: 176m2.

Architecturally designed and planned with purpose, this amazing house-sized security apartment is stylish and versatile with low maintenance and contemporary lifestyle in mind. Take advantage of one of the most spacious apartments you will come across, it is a must to inspect!

Situated in a young 4 year old complex, it is conveniently located within walking distance of City buses, local schools and park lands, this beautifully kept home presents a great opportunity for first home-buyers and savvy investors.

Located on the second floor of this rear security block featuring a North-East aspect and a neutral colour palette, this home was designed to maximise comfort and convenience.

The master bedroom presents the luxury of an ensuite, integrated storage and access to second living/rumpus/balcony. An additional huge sized room, perfect for the home office, study, second living or rumpus room.

The gourmet kitchen is complemented by two-tone cabinetry, giving it a sleek modern look. Accented with quality fittings and fixtures and featuring a gas cooktop, European stainless-steel appliances and a stone benchtop, the kitchen sits alongside the main air-conditioned open plan living and dining area.

HIGH POINTS

Apartment including balconies = 145m2

Separate storage = 3m2

Double side by side security parking = 28m2

Master suite with a generous ensuite, integrated storage and balcony access, totally private

Additional second living, rumpus, study

Deluxe bathroom with contemporary fittings and fixtures

Open-plan living and dining space with timber floors, AC and access to one balcony

Gourmet gas kitchen with a lovely outlook

Internal laundry with clothes dryer

Reverse cycle air-conditioning

Video intercom system

Two large balconies

Double security car spaces (side by side) with generous lockable storage cage

Lift access

Approx. 2 min drive to Bella Vista Metro Station

Approx. 750m walk to the nearest bus stop

Short walk to new family friendly recreation park


If you are experiencing any flu-like symptoms, have been in contact with any OVID-19 positive cases, we kindly ask that you refrain from attending our private appointments/open homes. Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or real estate agent. You should make your own inquiries as to its accuracy.
